articles.title: 'I always consider myself a very normal guy. If I did it, maybe somebody else can,' Rafael Nadal says of his French Open record - CNN
articles.description: With 14 French Open titles now to his name, the sporting world is running out of superlatives to describe Rafael Nadal.
